name: Bathyscaphe
description:
Here we have an endless skill game where you must recover all the treasures from the sea, and avoid the dangerous creatures there at the same time.

One-screen-game to play with friends.

Experience

Rock Rain 2 have EXPERIENCES, an achievement open library designed for GP2X and PC. You can win this achievements (200 points, 8 exps) if you install the Exp Application.

Language

English and Spanish.

Controls GAMEPADKEYSLEFTLEFTLEFTRIGHTRIGHTRIGHTUPAZPAUSEBACKESCAPE
